00037 #ifndef _nt_ring_buffer_obj_h_ 
00038 #define _nt_ring_buffer_obj_h_ 
00039 
00040 /* NT core includes */
00041 #include "nt_main.h" 
00042 #include "nt_types.h" 
00043 #include "nt_obj.h"  
00044 /* NT includes */
00045 #include "nt_error_obj.h"
00046 
00047 /* other includes */
00048 
00049 #include <vector>
00050 
00056 template <class T>
00057 class NT_ring_buffer_o {
00058 public:
00059 /***   Constructors, Copy/Assignment and Destructor  ***/
00060 NT_ring_buffer_o(NTsize newRingLength=2){ Init(newRingLength); }
00061 NT_ring_buffer_o(const NT_ring_buffer_o & original);
00062 const NT_ring_buffer_o & operator= (const NT_ring_buffer_o & right);
00063 virtual ~NT_ring_buffer_o(){}
00064 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00065 NTsize _ringLength() const { return ringLength;}
00067 NTreturn Resize(NTsize newRingLength) { Init(newRingLength); }
00068 void Push( T value ) { bufferVec[IncreaseCounter()] = value;}
00069 void Show() { vector <T> tmpVec = Buffer(); for(NTsize ll=0; ll< _ringLength(); ll++) cout << tmpVec[ll] << " "; cout << endl;}
00070 /* highest index is newest entry */
00071 vector <T> Buffer() {
00072                             vector <T> tmpVec(ringLength);
00073                             for (NTsize ll=0; ll< _ringLength(); ll++) tmpVec[ll] = bufferVec[(_counter()+ll+1) % ringLength];
00074                             return tmpVec;
00075                           }
00076 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00077 protected:
00078 /* ***  Methods              ***/  
00079 NTsize IncreaseCounter() {  counter = (counter + 1) % ringLength;
00080                             return counter; }
00081 NTsize _counter() { return counter; }
00082 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00083 NTsize ringLength;
00084 private:
00085 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00086 vector <T> bufferVec;
00087 NTsize counter;
00088 void Init(NTsize newRingLength) {
00089     counter = 0;
00090     ringLength = newRingLength;
00091     bufferVec.resize(ringLength);
00092 }
00093 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00094 };
00095 
00096 #endif /* _nt_ring_buffer_obj_h_ */
